parameters: background/bg_purelove
other/purelove_end_1
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna, you really came back.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] I'm home, Noah. Thank you for waiting for me all this time.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Since the final battle... I thought you'd never return...
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] This isn't a dream... right?
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Yeah.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Noah, I... was ordered by the village chief to be sold off, but I
never did anything strange with any other man.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna...

\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Because of my leg, I caused trouble for the village, so I was
prepared for Luna to be taken by another man.
other/purelove_end_2

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] What are you talking about? Noah fought for the village, for
everyone.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] That's why, even though the village chief told me to prostitute
myself, I didn't do it once because I love Noah so much.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] On the journey, Cain threatened me a lot. But I managed to deceive
him and throw him off the scent. Hehe, it seemed like Cain had almost
forgotten about the prostitution after a while.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna...
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] I love you, Noah.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] I love you too, Luna. Really...
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Right now, I'm so happy. To have returned from the final battle.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] To have met Noah again. I'm truly glad to be alive.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna...
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Let's get married soon.
other/purelove_end_4
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Yes. Noah, please take care of me.

\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Ah... but my leg is no good, right? Luna, are you sure you're okay
with someone like me?
other/purelove_end_5
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] It's fine!
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Really? It's not a bother? I might die someday because of it.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] It's okay.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Actually, there's a medicine that the servant, no... that Luca- san
is making for me. It's a medicine that works on the necrosis in Noah's
leg.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] He said it would be ready by the time I returned from the final
battle.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] The servant?

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Yes. Because I've been so devoted to thinking about you... If I
returned alive from the final battle, he wanted to give me the
medicine for necrosis.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] I think Noah's leg will definitely heal. I should have asked Luca-san
from the beginning. But he told me to keep it a secret from Rade-san
at all costs.

\C[29][Noah]\C[0] I see. Luca-san must have taken a liking to you, Luna. To the pure-
hearted Luna...
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna, what will you do now?

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] I haven't decided yet. There are things I want to investigate in the
imperial capital. But... I'm tired now, so I might not fight anymore.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] I see. It's up to you, Luna.
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Luna, I... will definitely make you happy.
other/purelove_end_5
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Yes!
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Noah, let's be happy together.
other/purelove_end_3
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Yes! Noah, let's be happy together!
\C[29][Noah]\C[0] Ah...! I love you, Luna.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] I love you too, Noah.
Luna and Noah got engaged.

A few days later, Luna received a "medicine effective against
necrosis" from a servant.
And then... Noah's leg was completely healed.

Afterward, Luna and the others headed to the cemetery where Mao and
Mei lay resting.
